Articles.Content:
I downloaded KSP from steam in today.I could be playing it,but when I tried to do EVA/IVA so moved mouse cursor to kerbal,and KSP suddenly crashed.I don't add any mods.game version is 1.1 OS is windows 7 home premium.machine spec is enough.about 1 year ago Same question did but it didn't reply anymore.

Sry for bad English,but give me any answers how to fix this problem.
Please test with current version and if it repeats for current KSP, create a bug on the bugtracker:   http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com
I downgraded to Version 1.0 and I can be playing KSP very comfortable thx for answer
